## UserProfileService.getUserAvatar() method

Beta version. Gets the avatar (profile picture) of a user.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getUserAvatar(escapedUserId: string): CancelablePromise<string>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type   | Description                                                                                           |
| ------------- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| escapedUserId | string | The TCM URI of the user with the colon escaped by replacing it with an underscore. E.g. "tcm_1-1-17". |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt;

string The request was successful.
